title: Milk at its best
creator_credit: Michael Robertson and Michael Robertson Film Productions
brief_description: Shows how advances in technology have brought about a major change in the production and marketing of milk in the past few years. Notes the use of fully automated systems in dairies which ensure maximum efficiency and cleanliness, and how further tests are carried out in laboratories before packaging or bottling. All aspects of milk production are supervised by the Dairy Industry Marketing Authority which exercises strict control over hygiene. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
